name: The Soul Tower
description:
Adelaide Global Game Jam 2022

Lead Game Design, Programming, Model, Prototyping - Michael Manson

Art, Game Design - Ants_nest

Game Design, Asset Recolour - TerminalSniper5

Lead Programmer, Game Design - impojr

Programmer - Dalibor

- The Soul Tower -

In the valley of the ancients, a Soul tower has emerged. This crystalline structure can only mean an evil soul trying to break into the world of the living.

As a Soul Guardian, who can SHIFT between the realms of living and dead (LEFT SHIFT), you have been sent with the task of scaling the tower. FIGHT LIGHT AND DARK SOULS while SHIFTING between these realms to reach the top and defeat the summoner of the tower.

These towers attract many souls from the realm of the dead. Using CAMPFIRES can empower your physical being or summon their skills to fight with you.

Incomplete: Missing/Bugs

(Many More)
